# alpine publish

Publish an instance.

```
alpine publish <instance> [<instance>...]
```

## Description

Publish an instance.

## Options

```
  -e, --encrypt             Encrypt published archive.
  -h, --help                help for publish
  -k, --public-key string   Public key file to encrypt.
```
